code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import api from"../services/api.js";import"../styles/UserManagement.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PromotionManagement=()=>{const[promotions,setPromotions]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{api.get("/promotions").then(res=>setPromotions(res.data));},[]);const handleDelete=async id=>{await api.delete(`/promotions/${id}`);setPromotions(promotions.filter(p=>p._id!==id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Qu\u1EA3n l\xFD Khuy\u1EBFn m\xE3i"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"T\xEAn khuy\u1EBFn m\xE3i"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"M\xE3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Gi\u1EA3m (%)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Ng\xE0y h\u1EBFt h\u1EA1n"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"H\xE0nh \u0111\u1ED9ng"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:promotions.map(promo=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:promo.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:promo.code}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[promo.discount,"%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:new Date(promo.expiry).toLocaleDateString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"action-btn",onClick:()=>handleDelete(promo._id),children:"Xo\xE1"})})]},promo._id))})]})]});};export default PromotionManagement;
